description:
Hayate gets lost. Nagi is suddenly all alone in the desert. “Hayate isn’t coming to get me. He’s not my butler anymore,” says Nagi. But then this series would come to an end! We can’t let that happen so Hayate starts looking for Nagi, while Nagi vows to look for Hayate.  But where did her butler go?
Source: crunchyroll
